title: 2chase
author: 2chase
created_time: May 19, 2022, 01:08:54 PMLast edit: August 11, 2022, 05:56:55 PM by 2chase
content: Do you WANT to buy SMART NFT PUNK for GAMES?HURRY UP!The sale is carried out absolutely SAFELY - through the NFT platform, with your Metamask!There are no any prepayments!The release of the game in which you will participate with this punk will be in the third quarter of this year!Look at these cool guys!Secure purchase through the platform, using a metamask. There are no prepayments.You can buy punks simply by connecting your metamask to the platform and buying directly from your wallet. If someone wants to discuss about prices, or offer their own - you can write me in telegram - https://t.me/Guardian4The average price for a common punk is from $3, for rare - from $7-8, for ultra - from $15, for epic - from $20, for legendary - from $40 and above. Prices may change. ALL PRICES WILL RISE CLOSER TO THE GAME'S RELEASE.At the moment, the number of high-ranking punks is very limited.A list of punks for sale can be found here: https://app.alturanft.com/user/0xFC560cD3CE6d4eBEb67F28540F6e4e5963c6B1A7?chain=bsc&view=listedAnd here: https://app.alturanft.com/user/0xFC560cD3CE6d4eBEb67F28540F6e4e5963c6B1A7?chain=bsc&view=wallet     (This punks do not have a price, which means that the price can be negotiated. If you like some punk from this list - just write me in telegram - https://t.me/Guardian30 with number of punk and we will talk about price.)Absolutely all this nft punks it's a playable characters in a game currently in development, which is scheduled for release in the 3rd quarter of this year.In the third quarter of this year, each of these punks will have the opportunity to become a playable character in the game, like a Pokemon, etc. It will possible to earn money with this punk and participate in airdrops. You will be able to receive various gifts and rewards with this punk. You can read more on this topic here:  https://alturapunks.comSince each of these punks is a playable character, it has its own separate rank accordingly. There are five ranks in total for these punks. The price depends on the rank.HURRY UP AND BUY YOUR NFT PUNK WITH AN AWESOME DISCOUNT BEFORE THE OFFICIAL RELEASE!

comments.author: FACE 2 FACE
comments.body: Quote from: 2chase on May 19, 2022, 01:08:54 PMThe average price for a common punk is from $3, for rare - from $7-8, for ultra - from $15, for epic - from $20, for legendary - from $40 and above. Prices may change. All prices will rise closer to the game's release.If the market will go further down, then there is not much point in buying these punks now. Just for memory. Or for fun. If the war between Russia and Ukraine does not end soon, then this may lead to the fact that the market will continue to fall.Although, of course, there is a chance that the developers will make this game despite the market situation.         I got a little familiar with the project and their website. And the situation looks a little strange - for example, if I want to buy a key from them through the application with which one random punk opens, then at the moment this key costs 21 bucks. But you're selling common punks for $3. What's the point of this ? The key costs 21, but you're gonna sell your epic punks for $20. Is there some kind of trick here? Why so cheap ?

comments.author: Krabat
comments.body: Cool punks dude! But I didn't see any of your legendary punks in stock. They are not here? You say that the sale price is from $40, but you don't have them on the list ?

comments.author: 2chase
comments.body: Quote from: FACE 2 FACE on May 19, 2022, 03:28:29 PMIs there some kind of trick here? Why so cheap ?There are no tricks, this nft platform is at an early stage of development, so for now there is such a paradox. But, while this may sound like a small advertisement, it seems to me that such cheap prices will not last very long, so the first buyers will certainly have a little better luck.Quote from: Krabat on May 20, 2022, 06:12:35 AMCool punks dude! But I didn't see any of your legendary punks in stock. They are not here? You say that the sale price is from $40, but you don't have them on the list ?The legendary punk was bought a few hours ago. I'm not sure if legendary punks will still be available, but everything can be. Maybe later there will be one or two. For now, you can look from what is available - the epic ranc, ultra rare, and further down the list - rare and common.The collection for sale will be gradually replenished, but mainly due to more average ranks. The number of legendary and epics will always be limited.

comments.author: llhibionada
comments.body: When is the release of the game that I can participate in with these punks? And I want to clarify something. If I buy two or more punks, will each of them have to participate in the game separately? Or can I have a team of two or more punks that will be related to my main player and participate in the game with several punks at once? That is, I'm interested in - is there any point in buying a lot of punks at once? Or just buy one but with a higher rank?

comments.author: 2chase
comments.body: Quote from: llhibionada on May 20, 2022, 12:51:20 PMWhen is the release of the game that I can participate in with these punks? And I want to clarify something. If I buy two or more punks, will each of them have to participate in the game separately? Or can I have a team of two or more punks that will be related to my main player and participate in the game with several punks at once? That is, I'm interested in - is there any point in buying a lot of punks at once? Or just buy one but with a higher rank?Nobody can answer this question exactly. The website says it's in the third quarter. Admins have the exact same answer. No specific dates have been announced yet. I think that by the middle of summer rhis game will  be launched!!! As for the second question, I still find it difficult to answer. But in any case - higher ranked punks have much more combat resource than lower ranked punks. For example, these are the characteristics of a regular punk compared to the characteristics of a legendary punk. As you can see in the column "total" - the legendary punk has a total resource of more than 5 !!! times the resource of a simple punk.On average, the general characteristics of any legendary punk are about 5 - 10 times higher than those of a punk with common rank.Based on this, having high-ranked punks is - always - better than lower ones.

comments.author: 2chase
comments.created_time: May 20, 2022, 07:26:10 PMLast edit: May 20, 2022, 07:52:53 PM by 2chase
comments.body: One of the rarest punks to have a crown on his head. I looked through probably about a thousand punks among the total and found only two similar ones, also having a crown. But this with an epic rank. With a total strength of 360 points !IT'S SOOOOOOOOO COOOOOL!!!!! Who wants to have a unique punk not only in terms of characteristics but also in appearance??  Who wants to flatter their ego and get a punk with a crown that almost no one else will have?

comments.author: Mandarava
comments.body: I bought a legendary and three epic ones. Wow !! I think this should be enough for the game. In my opinion, these were the last legendaries at this price. In the telegram channel, people are gradually beginning to realize that they sold their legendary ones in vain. In my opinion, autumn promises to be very hot. Hodl

comments.author: 2chase
comments.body: Quote from: Mandarava on May 22, 2022, 03:29:54 PMI bought a legendary and three epic ones. Wow !! I think this should be enough for the game. In my opinion, these were the last legendaries at this price. In the telegram channel, people are gradually beginning to realize that they sold their legendary ones in vain. In my opinion, autumn promises to be very hot. Hodl  My congratulations! Now the cheapest and at the same time not the most powerful legendary punks on the site have price starting from 65 $ and then much higher. The average price of the ten cheapest legendary punks on sale is now around $150 (ranging from $65 to $200). And then even higher. But now there are quite a few left. Apparently, those sellers who have them are not in a hurry to sell. And this is completely understandable. In summer-autumn, prices will rise more.

comments.body: Can i really earn something on these punks? Can someone explain to me why i should buy them? It's almost the same as those that are now worth hundreds of thousands? Why was it necessary to create exactly the same? Isn't this plagiarism? What is their value. I do not quite understand this hype about these pictures.

comments.body: Quote from: dvj33 on May 22, 2022, 09:17:16 PMHow can I buy one?Just follow this link - https://app.alturanft.com/user/0xFC560cD3CE6d4eBEb67F28540F6e4e5963c6B1A7?chain=bsc&view=listedconnect your metamask, then click on the punk you like, and press the "buy" button. To make it easier to search.
